Juno_UpdateItemData.B219707D4D40717FC31E2F9F3C7B0F24: Eat to heal and reduce Hunger. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.
Juno_UpdateItemData.336CB5E0430C56B49DCDE8941E86F8A4: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and gain temporary Cold Resistance. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.
Juno_UpdateItemData.64A4F0A843F6B87C22DD4B88D7EF9798: Eat to heal, reduce Hunger, and gain temporary Heat Resistance. Heals more in hot temperatures, less in cold.
Juno_UpdateItemData.CE8B0C8D4E0B2CA9429D6FA70619FA9F: It's cold AND hot. A delicious paradox!
